scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.railway-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
